alert.note: Alert for Baker; Colquitt; Decatur; Grady; Mitchell; Thomas; Worth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 22 at 3:32PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Decatur, Grady, Mitchell, northeastern Baker, northwestern Thomas, northwestern Colquitt and southern Worth Counties through 415 PM EST... At 332 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Newton to 9 miles east of Chattahoochee. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Newton, Bainbridge, Cairo, Pelham, Camilla, Baconton, Doerun, Ochlocknee, Whigham, West Bainbridge, Attapulgus, Sale City, Climax, Minton, Capel, Anderson City, Parkerville, Harrells Still, Laingkat and Calvary. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Colquitt; Decatur; Grady; Mitchell; Thomas; Worth
